title: 11. You developed a new mobile game that uses Cloud Spanner for storing user state, player profile and leaderboard. Data is always accessed by using the primary key. Your performance testing team identified latency issues in the application, and you suspect it might be related to table primary key configuration. You created the table by executing this DDL:What should you do to fix this read latency issue?
alternatives: A. Add another index on user_id column to speed up the data retrieval.
B. Make the table smaller by removing email_address and add another index on user_id column to speed up the data retrieval.
C. Make the table smaller by removing email_address.
D. Update the primary key (user_id) to not have sequential values.
